word_mean: 〔复spectra〕光谱：由反射和衍射得到的电磁振动波长之色带图。见invisble s.和visible s.。引伸此义，亦指可测量的活动范围，例如抗菌素的抑菌范围(抗菌谱)，疾病表现的完整范围(疾病谱)

sentence.Network_en: Politicians across the political spectrum have denounced the act.
sentence.Network_cn: 各党派的政客们都对该行为表示谴责。

sentence.Network_en: The two politicians represent opposite poles of the political spectrum.
sentence.Network_cn: 这两位从政者代表了政界的两个极端。

sentence.Network_en: The term "special needs" covers a wide spectrum of problems.
sentence.Network_cn: “特殊需求”一词包含的问题范围很广。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'spectre'): from Latin, literally image, apparition', from specere 'to look'

entry.def: The spectrum is the range of different colours which is produced when light passes through a glass prism or through a drop of water. A rainbow shows the colours in the spectrum.
A spectrum is a range of a particular type of thing.

example.ex: She'd seen his moods range across the emotional spectrum...
example.tran: 她见识过他的情绪波动会有多大。

example.ex: Politicians across the political spectrum have denounced the act...
example.tran: 各党派的政客们都对该行为表示谴责。

entry.tran: 波谱(如光波波谱、无线电波波谱等)
entry.def: A spectrum is a range of light waves or radio waves within particular frequencies.

example.ex: Vast amounts of energy, from X-rays right through the spectrum down to radio waves, are escaping into space...
example.tran: 大量的能量，从 X 光直到无线电电波，都正被泄露到太空中去。

example.ex: The individual colours within the light spectrum are believed to have an effect on health.
example.tran: 光谱中不同的颜色被认为对健康有不同的影响。

means.word_mean: 1. an ordered array of the components of an emission or wave
2. broad range of related values or qualities or ideas or activities

auth_sentence.content: Corruption and criminality can be found across the spectrum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Corruption and criminality can be found across the spectrum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Corruption and criminality can be found across the spectrum.

auth_sentence.content: Obama is at the other end of the spectrum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Obama is at the other end of the spectrum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Obama is at the other end of the spectrum.

auth_sentence.content: I have seen them from across the political spectrum.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have seen them from across the political spectrum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have seen them from across the political spectrum.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.en: This is a kind of atomic spectrum.
Many insects can perceive colours of the spectrum that are invisible to us.
sentences.cn: 许多昆虫能感觉到光谱中我们所看不见的颜色。

jushi.english: There's a wide spectrum of opinions on this question.
jushi.chinese: 对于这个问题的看法众说纷纭。

jushi.english: The radio spectrum has been opened up for the use of mobil phones.
jushi.chinese: 电磁波谱被发展应用在移动电话领域。

jushi.english: This is a kind of atomic spectrum.
